Detailed Description

Structure containing function pointers to the backplane provided API.

bp_notify_barrier_type bp_api_struct::notify_barrier_ptr

Notify backplane of a barrier creation or update

Parameters:
framework_id - unique id of the caller framework
scope_name - full hierarchical name of a pool
barrier_name - name of a barrier
aciton - ID of the action - current barrier counter - time units - current time
Returns:
void

Definition at line 1483 of file bp_provided.h.

bp_notify_config_type bp_api_struct::notify_config_ptr

Notify backplane of a configuration element creation or update

Parameters:
framework_id - unique id of the caller framework
cntxt - full hierarchical name of a quasi-static component where the configuration was set
instance_name - instance name of the quasi-static component being configured
field_name - name of the field being configured - size of the message stream - the message stream; may represent a packed typed object, an untyped raw stream (for integral values) or a stirng - time units - current time
Returns:
void

bp_notify_event_type bp_api_struct::notify_event_ptr

Notify backplane of an event creation or update

Parameters:
framework_id - unique id of the caller framework
scope_name - full hierarchical name of a pool
event_name - name of an event
aciton - ID of the action - size of the message stream - the message stream; may represent a packed typed object - time units - current time
Returns:
void

Definition at line 1471 of file bp_provided.h.

bp_notify_resource_type bp_api_struct::notify_resource_ptr

Notify backplane of a resource item creation or update

Parameters:
framework_id - unique id of the caller framework
action - an enumeration indicating a resource setting operation
item_scope - hierarchical scope for the notified resource
item_name - name of the resource item
accessor_name - full name of the context where the resource was set - size of the message stream - the message stream; may represent a packed typed object, an untyped raw stream (for integral values) or a stirng - time units - current time
Returns:
void

Definition at line 1416 of file bp_provided.h.

bp_register_time_cb_type bp_api_struct::register_time_cb_ptr

Register time-based callback request

Parameters:
framework_id - Unique ID of the framework adapter
time_unit - Time unit, according to the uvm_ml_time_unit enum
time_value - Value of the time, in time units as defined by the time_unit parameter
cb_data - Data to be passed back when the callback is triggered
Returns:
int
  • 1 : success
  • 0 : error
